'Ha-ha! Do you want the people of Combe to help you?'
'You're afraid of the Blackwolds, are you?'
'Best run home, little fool. Enjoy your day.'
'It'll be your last....'
Blackwold
Blackwold
Blackwold
'What are we going to do now, Eric?'
'I don't know... I thought you had control of the horse?'
'I did... well. as much control as I can have over a 60 stone creature!'
'Well, we need to get in to Combe before winter! We've made it all this way, we can't stop at the gate.'
'Yes, yes, just let me gather up this grain. We'll need it for the planting season.'
'What seems to be the problem here?'
'Their horse got spooked, broke the harness, and bolted.'
'Very well, but you folks are going to need to move along soon.'
'But the cart's axel broke when the horse reared! We'll need to get a new one before we can right the cart.'
'I'm sorry sir, but that's not my problem. I....'
'But what are we supposed to do? We....'
'Sir, my duty is keeping the roads clear; that makes you my problem! Now move along double quick.'
'It'd be best if you didn't ruffle her feathers. Her best friend just made constable, and shes a bit sore it wasn't her got chosen.'
